ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations and Employment Board Act
PrecisReappointment of AUGUSTUS MCLAUGHLIN RICHARDSON, Q.C., of Halifax, Nova Scotia, as a part-time member of the Federal Public Sector Labour Relations and Employment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years.
